docs.lead_paragraph: The bill, which would allow Medicare to negotiate lower drug prices for millions of older Americans, does not go as far as one passed by the House, which requires such negotiations.

headline.main: Senate Bill Seeks Power for Medicare on Drug Costs
headline.print_headline: Senate Bill Seeks Power For Medicare On Drug Costs

docs.snippet: The bill, which would allow Medicare to negotiate lower drug prices for millions of older Americans, does not go as far as one passed by the House, which requires such negotiations.
